---
title: "EDA dos projetos"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r read}
projetos = read_csv(here("data/projetos.csv"))
```

```{r clean}

```

## Distribuições

```{r}
projetos %>% 
    group_by(lang) %>% 
    summarise(n = n()) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = lang, y = n)) + 
    geom_col()
```

```{r}
projetos %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = lang, y = team)) + 
    geom_jitter(alpha = .4) + 
    scale_y_log10()
```

```{r}
projetos %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = sloc)) + 
    geom_histogram(bins = 20, fill = "white", color = "orange") + 
    facet_grid(lang ~ .) + 
    scale_x_log10()
```


```{r}
projetos %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = sloc, color = lang)) + 
    stat_ecdf() + 
    scale_x_log10()
```

```{r}
projetos %>% 
    ggplot(aes(x = build_success)) + 
    geom_density()
```
